author: Ananth Krishnan
title: Interview | ‘Testing and mass quarantines helped Wuhan defeat virus’
description: Doctor from the city explains how China battled COVID-19
content: Wuhan, the epicentre of the COVID-19 outbreak, is slowly rebounding after two months in lockdown. On Sunday, Wuhan and surrounding Hubei province reported no infections for the sixth straight day, unthinkable a month ago when the city was reporting daily infe… [+3805 chars]
